bhaviṣyat vyaktikam anāgatam anubhūta vyaktikam atītam sva vyāpāra aupārūḍham vartamānam
trayam ca etat vastu jñānasya jñeyam
yadi ca etat svarūpataḥ na abhaviṣyat na edam nirviṣayam jñānam udapatsyata
tasmāt atīta anāgatam svarūpatas asti iti
yat tu dṛṣṭi patham prāptam tat māyā iva su tucchakam iti
yadā tu sarve guṇāḥ katham ekaḥ śabdaḥ ekam indriyam iti
kutas ca etat anyāyyam
bahu caitta ālambanībhūtam ālambana ekam vastu sādhāranam
tat khalu na eka citta parikalpitam na api aneka citta parikalpitam kiṃtu sva pratiṣṭham
nimita anurūpasya ca pratyayasya a utpadyamānasya tena tena ātmanā hetuḥ bhavati
kecid āhuḥ
naca eka citta tantram vastu tad apramāṇakam tadā kim syāt
tad uparāga apekṣi tvāt cittasya vastu jñāta ajñātam
ayaskānta maṇi kalpā viṣayā ayaḥ sadharmakam cittam abhisambandhya
uparañjanti
yasya tu tat eva cittam viṣayaḥ tasya
syāt āśaṅkā cittam eva sva ābhāsam viṣaya ābhāsam ca bhaviṣyati iti agni vat
na tat su ābhāsam dṛśya tvāt
yathā itarāṇi indriyāṇi śabda ādayaḥ ca dṛśya tva anna su ābhāsāni tathā manasā api pratyetavyam
eka samaya ca aubhaya anavadhāraṇam
kṣaṇika vādinaḥ yat bhavanam sā eva kriyā tat eva ca kārakam iti abhyupagamaḥ
smṛti saṃkaraḥ ca
yāvantaḥ buddhi buddhīnām anubhavāḥ tāvatyaḥ smṛtayaḥ prāpnuvanti
tad saṃkarāt ca eka smṛti anavadhāraṇam ca syāt iti evam buddhi pratisaṃvedinam pratisaṃvedana puruṣam apalapadbhiḥ vaināśikaiḥ sarvam eva ākulītṛtam
katham
tathā ca uktam
atas ca etat abhyupagamyate
dṛṣṭṛ dṛśya auparaktam cittam sarvārtham

tat etat cittam eva draṣṭṛ dṛśya auparaktam viṣaya viṣayi nirbhāsam cetana acetana svarūpa āpannam viṣaya ātmakam api a viṣaya ātmakam iva acetanam cetanam iva sphaṭika maṇi kalpam sarva artham iti ucyate
anupampanīyāḥ te ikasmāt
asti hita iṣām bhrānti bījam sarva rūpa ākāra nirbhāsam cittam iti
evam grahītṛ grahaṇa grāhya svarūpa citta bhedāt trayam api etat jātitaḥ pravibhajante te samyak darśinaḥ taiḥ adhigataḥ puruṣaḥ
kutas ca
tat asaṃkhyeya vāsanābhiḥ citram api parārtham saṃhati kāri tvāt
na svārtham saṃhati a kāri tvāt gṛha vat
na sukha cittam sukha artham na jñānam jñāna artham ubhayam api etat parārtham
viśeṣa dharśiṇaḥ ātma bhāva bhāvanā nivṛttiḥ vinivṛttiḥ
sā tu viśeṣa darśinaḥ nivartate kutas cittasya eva eṣa vicitraḥ pariṇāmaḥ
puruṣaḥ tu asatyām avidyāyām śuddhaḥ citta dharmaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭaḥ eti
tatas asya ātmabhāva bhāvanā kuśalasya nivartate iti
tadā aviveka nimnam kaivalya prāgbhāram cittam
tadānīm yat asya cittam viṣaya prāgbhāram ajñāna nimnam āsīt tat asya anyathā bhavati kaivalya prāgbhāram viveka ja jñāna nimnam iti
hānam eṣām kleśa vat uktam
jñāna saṃskārāḥ tu citta adhikāra samāptim anuśerate
tad lābhāt avidyā ādayaḥ kleśāḥ sa mūla kāṣam kaṣitāḥ bhavanti kuśala akuśalāḥ ca karma āśayāḥ sa mūla ghātam hatāḥ bhavanti
tadā sarva āvaraṇa mala apetasya jñānasya ānantyāt jñeyam alpam
sarvaiḥ kleśa karma āvaraṇaiḥ vimuktasya jñānasya ānantyam bhavati
tatra yadā sarvaiḥ āvaraṇa malaiḥ apagatam bhavati tadā bhavati asya ānantyam
yatra edam uktam
tatas kṛtārthānām pariṇāma krama samāptiḥ guṇānām
tasya dharma meghasya odayāt kṛtārthānām guṇānām pariṇāma kramaḥ parisamāpyate na hi kṛta bhoga apavargāḥ parisamāpta kramāḥ kṣaṇam api avasthātum utsahante
tatra kūṭastha nityatā puruṣasya pariṇāmi nityatā guṇānām
kṛta bhoga apavargāṇām puruṣa artha śūnyānām yaḥ pratiprasavaḥ kārya kāraṇa ātmakānām guṇānām tat kaivalyam
sva rūpa pratiṣṭhā punar buddhi sattva an abhisambandhāt puruṣasya citi śaktiḥ eva kevalā
tasyāḥ sadā tathā eva avasthānam kaivalyam iti
